#{form_for(@user, :method => :post, :action => Users.r(:save)) do |f| f.input_hidden(:id) f.input_text('Username', :username) # Not setting an empty value for the password field would display the hash. # Note that setting it to nil wouldn't work as the BlueForm helper would still # try to extract the value from the @user object. f.input_password('Password', :password, :value => '') f.input_submit('Submit') end}
